0.user_question: A store had 40 oranges in a bin. If they threw away 25 of the old ones and put 21 new ones in the bin how many would be in the bin?

ost_step.1: Identify the initial quantity of oranges in the bin. There were 40 oranges.
ost_step.2: Subtract the oranges thrown away. The store threw away 25 oranges, so we subtract this from the initial quantity: 40 - 25 = 15 oranges remaining.
ost_step.3: Add the new oranges put into the bin. The store added 21 new oranges to the bin: 15 + 21 = 36 oranges.
